attributes.title: Do not download!
attributes.review: Downloading this app is probably one of the worst decisions I have ever made. At first glance it seems like a perfectly fine app but when attempting to open it, it immediately crashes, no matter what I do. Restarting my phone, deleting other apps so it has space, everything. It always crashes. I wasnâ€™t even able to get into the log in screen! On top of that It has continuously caused my phone to crash even when not on the app. I just bought the brand new iPhone 11 but because of this app Iâ€™ve had to take it into the shop to get it repaired. Thank god I have a warranty. Reading the other reviews I know Iâ€™m not the only one experiencing this and Iâ€™m so saddened that others have had to deal with this awful excuse for an app. Please, do yourself a favor and avoid this app at all costs. Itâ€™s better in the long run.
